tool_description: Easily check if a certain e-mail address is valid. Is it a valid domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? That's a common indicator of spamming/trolling, so now there's an API for you so you can easily block it!
name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain_v2
title: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain
tool_name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain_v2

api_list.name: mailcheck
api_list.description: Check if e-mail domain is valid, or a disposable/temporary address. Invalid domains (typos, non-responding mailserver, etc) will return "valid: false", "block: true". Disposable e-mail domains will return "valid: true" (since it's a valid domain), but "block: true" and "disposable: true".

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Full e-mail, or domain to check if valid or temporary/disposable. You can enter an e-mail address, and it will be converted to a domain, but entering just the domain is recommended for user privacy reasons.

utterances.utterance: Is the domain 'gmail.com' valid and not disposable?
Check if 'yahoo.com' is a temporary email domain.
Verify if 'outlook.com' is a disposable email domain.
Is 'protonmail.com' a valid and non-disposable domain?
Check the validity of the domain 'icloud.com'.
Verify if 'zoho.com' is a valid email domain.
Check if 'fastmail.com' is a valid and non-disposable domain.
